name: ChatFi
description: ChatFi is an AI-driven DeFi assistant accessible via WhatsApp using Twilio and Node.js. Users can check their wallet balances, swap tokens (e.g., TFILâ†”USDFC), request staking options, and even analyze drone imagery using AI models. Built with Express.js, Twilio, and static mock responses, the bot simulates real DeFi experiences on Flow and Filecoin testnets.
